## MapViewUtils.calculateFocalLengthByVerticalFov() function

Calculates the focal length based on the vertical FOV and height.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function calculateFocalLengthByVerticalFov(vFov: number, height: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  vFov | number | Vertical field of view in rad. |
|  height | number | Height of canvas in pixels. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
